CustomField.description: Checking this box sets Dialer Status to "Abilto Removed", Customer Status to "Closed_Benefits", and Marketo Sync Filter to unchecked. These fields cannot be updated once this box is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checking this box sets Dialer Status to "Abilto Removed", Customer Status to "Closed_Benefits", and Marketo Sync Filter to unchecked. These fields cannot be updated once this box is checked.
CustomField.label: Hard Opt Out
